LanguageData.OMC_Drone.label: Mistie
LanguageData.OMC_Drone.description: The personal drone-companion is designed by OMC as a combat assistant improves the owner stats and can firing independently.\n\nUses as a weapon reconstructed OMC Shotgun.
LanguageData.OMC_Drone.verbs.0.label: Doom
LanguageData.OMC_Drone.comps.Comp_VerbGiver.verbProps: Reconstructed OMC Shotgun for use by drone.
LanguageData.OTC_Drone_Acid.label: Tempestrian(Acid)
LanguageData.OTC_Drone_Acid.description: The personal drone-companion is designed by OTC as a combat assistant improves the owner stats and can firing independently.\n\nUses as a weapon reconstructed OTC Pistol. Charged with Acid damage.
LanguageData.OTC_Drone_Acid.verbs.0.label: Celestial
LanguageData.OTC_Drone_Acid.comps.Comp_VerbGiver.verb: Reconstructed OTC Pistol for use by drone. Charged with Acid damage.

LanguageData.OTC_Drone_Cryo.description: The personal drone-companion is designed by OTC as a combat assistant improves the owner stats and can firing independently.\n\nUses as a weapon reconstructed OTC Pistol. Charged with Cryo damage.

LanguageData.OTC_Drone_Cryo.comps.Comp_VerbGiver.verb: Reconstructed OTC Pistol for use by drone. Charged with Cryo damage.
LanguageData.OTC_Drone_Fire.label: Tempestrian(Fire)
LanguageData.OTC_Drone_Fire.description: The personal drone-companion is designed by OTC as a combat assistant improves the owner stats and can firing independently.\n\nUses as a weapon reconstructed OTC Pistol. Charged with Fire damage.

LanguageData.OTC_Drone_EMP.label: Tempestrian(EMP)
LanguageData.OTC_Drone_EMP.description:
The personal drone-companion is designed by OTC as a combat assistant improves the owner stats and can firing independently.

Uses as a weapon reconstructed OTC Pistol. Charged with EMP damage.

Warning! EMP damage isn't intended to destroy meatbags.
LanguageData.OTC_Drone_EMP.verbs.0.label: Celestial
LanguageData.OTC_Drone_EMP.comps.Comp_VerbGiver.verbP: Reconstructed OTC Pistol for use by drone. Charged with EMP damage.\n\nWarning! EMP damage isn't intended to destroy meatbags.
LanguageData.OCC_Drone.label: Shinmura
LanguageData.OCC_Drone.description: The personal drone-companion is designed by OCC as a combat assistant improves the owner stats and can firing independently.\n\nUses as a weapon reconstructed OCC Revolver.
LanguageData.OCC_Drone.verbs.0.label: Hornet
LanguageData.OCC_Drone.comps.Comp_VerbGiver.verbProps: Reconstructed OCC Revolver for use by drone.
LanguageData.OEC_Drone.label: Zenoth
LanguageData.OEC_Drone.description: The personal drone-companion is designed by OEC as a combat assistant improves the owner stats and can firing independently.\n\nUses as a weapon reconstructed OEC Sniper Rifle.
LanguageData.OEC_Drone.verbs.0.label: Judgement
LanguageData.OEC_Drone.comps.Comp_VerbGiver.verbProps: Reconstructed OEC Sniper Rifle for use by drone.
LanguageData.OES_Drone.label: Deli
LanguageData.OES_Drone.description:
The personal heroic drone-companion is designed by OES as a combat assistant improves the owner stats and can firing independently.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Uses as a weapon reconstructed OES Bow.
LanguageData.OES_Drone.verbs.0.label: Heroic Pride
LanguageData.OES_Drone.comps.Comp_VerbGiver.verbProps: Reconstructed OES Bow for use by drone.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Uses as a weapon reconstructed OMG Pistol.
